participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys deep conversations about life.
participant_1.background: I have been working on my car at night, trying to fix it without them knowing. I read up on the history of my city in preparation for a visit from my best friend. The weather here is very cold, but so beautiful in the spring. I am an accountant. I met my birth mother when I was sixteen.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Creative and sensitive, often expresses emotions through art and writing.
participant_2.background: I have a baby mobile that plays the Lumineers' songs. I love to express myself through poetry and makeup. When people don't like my social media posts, it upsets me. I don't believe in love. I've been told my steaks are to die for.

content.text: I'm doing well! Thanks for asking. I'm just working on some poetry.
Oh that's cool! I like to write too. What kind of poetry do you like to write?
I like to write about love and relationships. I just don't believe in them, so it's a bit of a struggle sometimes.
Oh, I can see how that would be a struggle. I'm not sure if I believe in love either, but I still love to write about it.
I love hearing about other people's experiences in relationships. It helps me to understand the world a little better.
I think it's important to be open to all kinds of experiences, even if you don't necessarily agree with them.
I agree. I think it's the best way to learn and grow.
So what are you working on right now?
I'm working on a poem about a couple who is trying to make their relationship work. It's a little bit sad, but I think it's beautiful.
Sounds like it could be really good! I'd love to read it when you're finished.
I'll send it to you as soon as it's done. Thanks for chatting with me!
No problem! It was fun talking to you.
